LMSQueue Class Reference

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue. More...

#include <lmsqueue.h>

Detailed Description

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue.

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue algorithm.

Template parameters
  • GC lock-free reclamation schema (garbage collector)
  • T type of item stored in queue
  • TRAITS class traits. The default is traits
  • ALLOCATOR node allocator. The default is CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR.
There are specialization for each appropriate reclamation schema GC.

Source: [2004] Edya Ladan-Mozes, Nir Shavit "An Optimistic Approach to Lock-Free FIFO Queues"
